TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SKPaymentTransactionState extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.StoreKit.SKPaymentTransactionState Failed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The transaction failed, check the Error property of the SKPaymentTransaction for actual details.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.StoreKit.SKPaymentTransactionState Purchased = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The item has been purchased, the application can give the user access to the content.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.StoreKit.SKPaymentTransactionState Purchasing = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Transaction is being processed by the AppStore.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.StoreKit.SKPaymentTransactionState Restored = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The transaction has restored the original content purchased by the user.
